Text.Page:
, the organization needs your help with a rather unusual task.

Fish in this area stink so bad that they're inedible, but in the forest west of here is a mushroom that eliminates the odor and adds a delicious flavor. Tasty and profitable!

Can you gather some fragrant mushrooms for me? I know mycology isn't your thing, but I also know rewards are very much your thing.

Oh, yes! Mushrooms! We sell these in volume on a daily basis. Strictly for cuisine, mind you.

The organization profits, and our profits are your profits.
This fishy smell is terrible! Bring me some fragrant mushrooms as soon as you can.
